Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute near Pulaski/Adams
ShortDescription: #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to police activity near Pulaski/Adams.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to police activity near Pulaski/Adams.

Southbound buses will operate via Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Congress and Pulaski, then resume their normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via Pulaski, Harrison, Independence, Hamlin, Madison and Pulaski, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed Chicago
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Chicago due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Chicago due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

This may include 
#56 Milwaukee
#66 Chicago

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
